CustomBehavior.Title: Dailies Complete
CustomBehavior.Text: All Darkmoon Faire dailies have been completed. Continue for other turn-ins, or we'll see you tomorrow!
Checking on what to do/buy while we're in town!
Blacksmithing Quest detected, heading to Anvil.
Alchemy Quest detected, heading to Kuruk to buy things.
Inscription quest detected, heading to trade vendor.
Leatherworking quest detected, heading to trade vendor.
Tailoring quest detected, heading to trade vendor.
Cooking quest detected, heading to cooking supplier.

ElseIf.Condition: Me.ZoneId == 5861 && (((Me.GetSkill(Styx.SkillLine.Alchemy).CurrentValue >= 75) && !IsQuestCompleted(29506) && GetItemCount(1645) < 5) || ((Me.GetSkill(Styx.SkillLine.Inscription).CurrentValue >= 75) && !IsQuestCompleted(29515) && GetItemCount(39354) < 5) || ((Me.GetSkill(Styx.SkillLine.Leatherworking).CurrentValue >= 75) && !IsQuestCompleted(29517) && (GetItemCount(6529) < 10 || GetItemCount(2320) < 5 || GetItemCount(6260) < 5)) || ((Me.GetSkill(Styx.SkillLine.Tailoring).CurrentValue >= 75) && !IsQuestCompleted(29520) && (GetItemCount(2320) < 1 || GetItemCount(2604) < 1 || GetItemCount(6260) < 1)) ((Me.GetSkill(Styx.SkillLine.Cooking).CurrentValue >= 75) && !IsQuestCompleted(29509) && GetItemCount(30817) < 5))

Something went wrong and we're not where we should have been!

CustomBehavior.Title: Game tokens required!
CustomBehavior.Text: There was a issue with buying game tokens. Please manually buy some and continue.
Finished all Darkmoon Faire quests we could, heading home!
